juzs.text: Ur pnamaret At Tezmamt, siwa s wawal aeidan, siwa wid degsen idensen. Init: "numen s wayen id irsen $uone$, id irsen $uowen. Oebbi nne$, akked Oebbi nnwen, Yiwen. Nekwni $uoeS d imvuaen
Akka ay ed Nessers, $uoek, Tazmamt. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, umnen yis. Ger wigi, kra umnen yis. I inekoen issekniyen nne£, siwa ijehliyen
Ur telliv temmalev kra n Tezmamt, uqbel tagi; ur p tepparuv, s uyeffus ik. Yili ad cukken inekkaoen
Xaii, neppa d issekniyen iberrzen, deg idmaren n wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni. Siwa imednas, i inekoen issekniyen nne£
Nnan: "a lemmer id rsen fellas, issekniyen s$uo Mass is"! Ini: "issekniyen ar Oebbi kan. Nek, d aneddao kan, ipbegginen
Ne$, ur steqnaaen ara s trusi $uoek, s$uone£, n Tezmamt, malen asen p. Deg waya, s tidep, aeunu, akked usmekti i ugdud iumnen
Ini: "Iqadd Oebbi, d anagi gari yidwen. Issen i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Wid iumnen di tkerkas, u ugin Oebbi, widak d imexsuoen
Seirin k $ef uaaqeb. Lemmer macci d lajel ipwassnen, a ten id ias uaaqeb. Ih, a ten id ias, deqzalla, ur bnin
Seirin k $ef uaaqeb. Ih, Loahennama a ppezzi i ijehliyen
Ass ideg ar asen isbur uaaqeb, sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaoen nnsen, ad Yini: "jeoobet ayen txeddmem
A yimdanen iW iumnen, ni$ tamurt iW tewsaa. Ihi, aabdet iyI, Nek
Yal iman, ad ijeooeb tameppant; sinna, $uone£ a d tu$alem
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad asen Nerr tanezdu$t di Loennet m t$uofatin, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen, degs ad wekkoen. D asaadi warraz n wid ixedmen lxio
wid iueboen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
Aceal n leweuc, ur d neppawi ooeeq nnsen. Oebbi Ioeeq iten, u Ioeeq ikwen. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, i Inuben s yiiij akked waggur"? A d inin, war ccekk: "d Oebbi". Ihi, acimi wexxoen
Oebbi Issugut l$it i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, u Iwezzen as. Ih, Oebbi Issen yal cci
Ma testequav ten: "anwa id Isse$layen aman seg igenni, Issidir yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is"? A d inin, war ccekk, "d Oebbi". Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi". Maca, tegwti degsen, ur fhimen
Tameddurt agi, di ddunit, siwa lhawiyya, d wurar. D axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, ay d amuddir, lemmer eoin
Mara rekben di lbabuo, ad naaoen Oebbi, d idiniyen zeddigen $uoeS. Mi ten Isellek ar lberr, atnan la pcaraken
Ad nekoen ayen i sen Nefka, ad zhun, deqqal ad eoen
Day ur walan ara, Nerra loamaa n laman, wanag la pwaxvafen imdanen i sen d izzin? Day ad amnen di tkerkas, u ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Anwa i idensen kteo: win id isnulfan tikerkas af Oebbi, ne$ win irran tidep d tikerkas, mi t id tusa? Day macci d Loahennama ay d tanezdu$t i ijehliyen
Wid ijuhden ar loiha nne£, a ten Nenhu, war ccekk, s iberdan nne£. Ih, Oebbi Ippili ar lauuam
Alm
IoOoumiyen rnan ten
deg wakal aqoib mavi. Deffir lexsaoa nnsen, ad rnun
di kra iseggwasen. Lameo ar Oebbi, uqbel aya, u ssyen $eo da. Assen, ad feoeen lmumnin
s rrbee n Oebbi. Isserbae win i S ihwan. Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
D lemaahda n Oebbi. Oebbi ur Ipxallaf ara lemaahda S, maca, tegwti n medden ur ssinen
Ssnen ayen id innunnten, di tmeddurt n ddunit. £ef laxeot nitni stehzan
Day ur meyyzen ara deg iman nnsen? Ur Ixliq Oebbi tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep, akked lajel ipwassnen. Ih, aias n medden i inekoen timlilit d Mass nnsen

Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren? Llan ifen ten tazmert, $zan tamurt, $elben ten akken i p aamoen. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen. Ur ten Idnis Oebbi. Maca d nitni i idensen iman nnsen
D$a teqsee taggara n laaouo. Skaddben issekniyen n Oebbi. Pmmaaliken fellasen
Oebbi Inezzu lxelq; sinna, Ippales it id. Sinna, $uoeS ara tu$alem
Ass ideg ara d ijbu yimir, ad feqaen ibe$wviyen
Ur ten pselliken wid pcaraken. Ad nekoen wid pcaraken
Ass ideg ara d ijbu yimir, assen ad mfaoaqen
Wanag wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ad zhun di tebeirt
Ma d wid ijehlen, inekoen issekniyen nne£, akked temlilit n laxeot, widak ar uaaqeb ara rsen
Gedha s Oebbi, tameddit nnwen, tauebeit nnwen
I Neppa ccekoan, di tmurt akked igenwan, tameddit u di pnaufa n wass
Issuffu$ ed amuddir si lmegget. Issuffu$ ed lmegget seg umuddir. Issidir akal, deffir tmeppant is. Akka ara d teff$em
Seg issekniyen iS: Ixelq ikwen seg wakal. Aql akwen d imdanen tembwezzaam
Seg issekniyen iS: Ixelq awen, segwen, tiaggaltin nnwen, a pzed$em yidsent. Irra garawen tayri, lmaenana. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Seg issekniyen iS: lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, amgirred ger tutlayin nnwen, akked initen nnwen. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i imusnawen
Seg issekniyen iS: ives nnwen deg iv, deg wass, anadi nnwen n lfevl iS. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud isellen
Seg issekniyen iS: Issenaat awen leboaq, degs tugdi, asirem. Issadar ed aman seg igenni, Issidir yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud ifehmen
Seg issekniyen iS: s lameo iS, igenni akked tmurt bedden. Sinna, ma Isawel awen d, yiwen usiwel, seg wakal kunwi a d teff$em
IneS i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Akken ma llan, unzen aS
D Neppa i Inezzun lxelq, sinna Ippales it id. D ayen i S isehlen mavi. IneS umedya aalayan, di tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab

Ibbwi yawen d amedya, seg iman nnwen: day tcerkem d waklan nnwen, ayen i s ikwen N$at, d$a taadlem yidsen? Day ten teppagwadem, akken teppemyagwadem garawen? Akka ay Nepfeuuil issekniyen i ugdud ipxemmimen
Xaii! Wid idensen teddun d lhawiyyat nnsen, ur ssinen. Anwa ara inhun wid Itlef Oebbi? Ur sain imaiwnen
Smil udem ik adini ar tidep, d lxelq n Oebbi akken id Ixleq imdanen. Ur illi ubeddel, di lxelq n Oebbi. Wagi d ddin amxallef, maca, tegwti n medden ur ssinen
D imvuaen iS, eezzbet aS, beddet i teallit, ur ppilit seg wid ipcaraken
seg wid ifeoqen ddin nnsen. U$alen d iayfat, yal akabar icoee s wayen isaa
Imdanen, ma iwwet iten wugur, ad naaoen Mass nnsen, d imvuaen iS. Sinna, ma Iseess asen aeunu, s$uoeS, a pwaliv arbaa degsen pcaraken i Mass nnsen
iwakken ad nekoen i sen Nefka. Zhut! Deqqal a ppeeoem
Ne$ Nessader asen ed amvebbeo, i ipmeslayen $ef wayen i S pcaraken
Mi Neseess aeunu i imdanen, ad ceoeen yis. Ma teuza ten tucmip, seg wayen id urwen ifassen nnsen, ad aysen
Day ur walan ara ar Oebbi Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Efk as leeqq is i llezm ik, i ume$bun, i win id ibbwi ubrid. Ppif akka i wid ib$an udem n Oebbi. D widak ay d imerbae
Ayen teppakem n rrba, iwakken ad issem$weo ayla n medden, ar Oebbi ur issim$uo ara. Ayen tepzekkim $ef udem n Oebbi, d ayen ara ibuoekten
Oebbi, ikwen id Ixelqen, sinna, ikwen I$aten, sinna, ara kwen In$en, sinna, ara kwen id Issidren. Day ara ixdem kra, seg waya, yiwen seg wid tepcarakem? Gedha s yiS, Aalayan sennig wid pcaraken
Iveho ed lefsad di lberr u di yill seg wayen id urwen ifassen n medden, iwakken ad Isukk fellasen kra seg wayen xedmen, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, muqlet amek tevoa d imezwura. Tegwti, segsen, pcaraken
Err udem ik ar ddin amxallef, uqbel a d ias s$uo Oebbi, ass ur nepwexxio. Assen, ad pwaferzen
Win ijehlen, tijehli s mgal is; wid ixeddmen ayen ilhan, gemren i iman nnsen
Iwakken ad Ikafi, s lfevl iS, wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara ijehliyen
Seg issekniyen iS: Ippazen ed avu abcir, ad awen Iseess, cwii, seg ueunu S; ad iaajel lbabuo, s lameo iS. A pnadim lfevl iS, amar a ppesnemmrem
Ni$ Nuzen ed, uqbel ik, imazanen i igduden nnsen. Usan ten id, s ubeggen. Nerra d ppao seg wid ibe$wven. Aslak n lmumnin d lwaoeb nne£
Oebbi, id Ippaznen avu isseleayen asigna, a t ifser, deg igenni, akken i S ihwa, a t Issemfaoeq, a pwaliv ageffur a d iteffe$ segs. Mi t Issawev ar wid i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, a ten tafev ceoeen
Wanag, iu$ leal, llan uysen, uqbel ad asen d i$li
Wali lateo ueunu n Oebbi: amek id Issidir akal, deffir tmeppant is. Ih, d Win, s tidep, i Issidiren lmeggtin. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Mara Nazen avu, ara walin ippiwoi$, a pdum, deffir es, tjehli nnsen
Ma d kecc, s tidep, ur tezmirev a pperrev lmeggtin ad slen, ne$ iaeeeugen ad slen i tnaaoit, ma u$alen $er deffir
Ur tezmirev a penhuv ider$alen, mgal ttelfan nnsen. Ara terrev ad ak slen, siwa wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£. Nitni d imvuaen
Oebbi, ikwen Ixelqen si oehfan; sinna, deffir oehfan, Irra tazmert; sinna, deffir tezmert, Irra oehfan, akked ccib. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Neppa d Amusnaw, d Aeernuk
Ass ideg ara d ijbu yimir, ad gallen ibe$wviyen, ar siwa saaa segmi mmuten. Akka ay skiddiben
Ad inin wid iwumi teppunefk tussna, akked liman: "ni$ teqqimem di Tezmamt n Oebbi, ar ass n tnekra. Wagi d ass n tnekra, maca tellam ur tessinem
Assen, wid idensen, ur ten tepsellik nndama ne$ asuter n ssmae
Ni$ Nefka, i medden, yal amedya di Leqwoan agi. Maca, mi sen d tebbwiv assekni, ad ak inin, war ccekk, wid ijehlen: "kunwi d wid ireoonen
Akka i Iselle$ Oebbi ulawen n wid ur nessin
Eubeo, ih, lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Ur k seirin, wid ur nepputebbet
Alm
Wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt tuuwibt
d nnhaya u d aeunu i iaaoviyen
wid ibedden i teallit, ipzekkin, ipputebbten af laxeot
Wigi, di nnhaya s$uo Mass nnsen. Wigi, d isaadiyen
Ger yimdanen, wid ippa$en awal n zzhu, iwakken ad nnetlafen seg ubrid n Oebbi, war tamusni. U fellas ttihin. I wigi, aaaqeb isdullun
Ma mlan as issekniyen nne£, ad ibren s tem$weo, amzun ur asen isli, amzun aaegen as imeeeu$en. Xebbeo it s uaaqeb aqeoean
Ih, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, leonanat isaadiyen
Degsen ad wekkoen. Lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ixleq igenwan, war tigejda ara twalim. Irra di tmurt idurar, iwakken ur tepzenzil ara yiswen. Iwezzaa, degs, yal lxelq. Nessader ed aman seg igenni. Nessem$i d degs, yal tayuga tukyist
Wagi d lxelq n Oebbi. Sseknet iyi d, acu d xelqen wid ur nelli d Neppa. Xaii, imednas atnan di ttelfan n uuee
Ni$ Nefka i Luqman uuwab: "snemmer Oebbi. Win isnemmiren, isnemmir kan i iman is. Ma d wid ijehlen, ihi, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz
Mi inna Luqman i mmi s, la t isselmad: "a mmi! Ur pcarak i Oebbi. Ccerk, s tidep, d ddens abarar
Nweuua amdan $ef imawlan is. Imma s temeen s tadist is. Tuiva s, sin iseggwasen. Snemmer iyI, u i imawlan ik. Tu$alin $uoI
Ma eeppmen fellak, ad iyI tcarkev ayen ur tessinev, ur asen teddu di leb$i. Illi yidsen d uwqim di ddunit. Ddu d ubrid n wid isteooaen $uoI. Sinna, tu$alin nnwen $uoI, ad awen Mle$ ayen txeddmem
Ih, a mmi, xas am taeeyt uaaqqa ucceryad, ara yilin di teeout, ne$ deg igenwan, ne$ di tmurt, a p id Iawi Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi d Laiif, Ieoa
A mmi, bedd i teallit, ameo lewqama, iiixxeo i wayen n dir, eubeo i wayen ara k id iasen! Aya, s tidep, seg uazzem i lumuo
Ur sxunzuo ar medden, ur teddu di tmurt s ii$aya! Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel yal imnefxi, amzuxi
Ioqiq di tikli k, ssers uuut ik! Ni$ uuut ucmit mavi, d win n ye$yal

Day ur twalam ara, Inub Oebbi fellawen s wayen akw illan deg igenwan, akked wayen illan di tmurt? Isserwa yawen l$it iS, uvhio, uffir. U llan l$aci i ipnamaren $ef Oebbi, war tamusni, ne$ nnhaya, ne$ Tazmamt timnewweot
Ma nnan asen: "ddut akked wayen id Issader Oebbi", a d inin: "xaii, a neddu akked wayen id nufa ar imezwura nne$". I ma Cciian atan la ten inecced ar uaaqeb n tmes
Win ifkan i Oebbi udem amvua, u neppa d aaeovi, iiief deg ufus iueeean mavi. Ar Oebbi, tu$alin n lumuo
Win ijehlen, ur k t$webben tjehli s! £uone£, tu$alin nnsen; ad asen Nini acu xedmen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
A ten Neoo ad zhun cwii, sinna, a Neeppem fellasen aaaqeb iwaaoen
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan"? A d inin, war ccekk: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi". Maca, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
I Oebbi i illan akw di tmurt akked igenwan. Ih, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz
Xas lukan ttjuo akw n ddunit d leqlamat, u yill, ernu yas ua ilellen nniven, d lmidad nnsen, ur pqamen awalen n Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Lxelq nnwen, tanekra nnwen, amzun d yiman yiwen kan. Ih, Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Day ur twalav ara, Oebbi Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. Ieeppem i yiiij akked waggur ad leun, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ih, Oebbi Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Akka, acku Oebbi d Tidep. Ayen u$uo naaoen, war Neppa, d tikerkas. Oebbi, d Aalayan, d Ameqwoan
Day ur twalav ara ssfina, teppazal di yill s lqwedoa n Oebbi, iwakken ad awen d Issenaat seg issekniyen iS. Ih, deg wayagi, issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ma tesbur asen lmuja, am tillas, ad nujen ar Oebbi, $uoeS s ddin azedgan. Mi ten Isellek ar lberr, kra, degsen, iifen deg wawal nnsen. I inekoen issekniyen nne£, siwa yal axeddaa ajehli

A yimdanen! Eezzbet i Mass nnwen. Agwadet ass ideg ababat ur d ilehhu d mmi s, u mmi s ur d ilehhu d baba s, s wacemma. Ih, lemaahda n Oebbi, d tidep. Ur kwen tep$uoou tmeddurt n ddunit. Ur kwen issefoa$ im$weooi, $ef Oebbi
Oebbi, s tidep, $uoeS tamusni n yimir. Issadar ed ageffur. Ieoa i illan di taabbuvin. Ur ieoi yiwen acu ara ikseb azekka; ur ieoi yiwen anwa akal ideg ara immet. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa, d Amusnaw
Alm
Tarusi n Tezmamt, ur illi degs ccekk, s$uo Mass imavalen
Ne$ a d inin: "isnulfa p id". Xaii, neppat, d tidep s$uo Mass ik, iwakken a pnedoev agdud u$uo ur d iusi ara uneddao, uqbel ik, amar ad pwanhun
Oebbi i Ixelqen tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di sdis wussan; sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld. Ur tesaim, war Neppa, bab, ne$ amcafaa. Day ula d tesmektayem ara
A d Iseyyi lameo seg igenni ar tmurt; sinna, ad iu$al $uoeS deg ibwass, lmudda s: agim iseggwasen, s leesab nnwen
Akka, Umusnaw n wayen iffren, u n wayen ur neffir, Uzmir Ipeunun
I Iuuegmen akw ayen Ixleq. Inza d lxelq n umdan, si talaxt
Sinna, Issuffe$ ed tarwa s si l$ella, degs cwii n waman
Sinna, Imesl it, Iuuuv degs, si ooue iS. Irra yawen timesliwt, ieoi, ul. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Nnan: "ma nweddeo di tmurt, day a d nepwaxleq tikelt nniven"? Xaii, nekoen timlilit akked Mass nnsen
Ini: "ad iddem ooue nnwen, lmelk n tmeppant i ippukelfen fellawen. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen a ppu$alem
Lemmer a pwaliv ibe$wviyen, ad brun i iqweooa nnsen, zdat Mass nnsen: "a Mass nne$! Nwala, nesla; Err ane$ a nexdem ayen ilhan. S tidep, numen
Lemmer i £ ihwi, yili Nefka, i yal ooue, nnhaya s. Maca, ad ivou wayen Nni$: "war ccekk, ad Acaoe$ Loahennama s leonun akked yimdanen, mejmulen
Ihi, jeoobet imi teppum a d temlilem d wass nnwen agi! Nekwni, ih, Neppu kwen. Jeoobet aaaqeb, n lebda, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
I iumnen kan, s issekniyen nne£, d wid, mara ten id mmektin, ara weddin ad knun, ara isbucuaen Mass nnsen s ccekoan, nitni ur pzuxxun
Ppensaren d ibeodiyen nnsen, seg imieoeen, pnujun $eo Mass nnsen, s tugwdi d usirem. Seg wayen iten N$at, pseddiqen
Ur ieoi yiwen acu i sen Ffre$ n lfeoe. D arraz n wayen llan xeddmen
Win illan d lmumen, day am win illan d amed$ul? Ur aadilen
Ihi, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, leonanat imoaebiyen, ara zed$en, ilmend n wayen xeddmeun
Wanag wid ide$wlen, di tmes ara zed$en. Yal tikelt ideg ara b$un a d ff$en segs, a ten rren $uoes, ad asen inin: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmes i tnekkoem
Ih, a Nessukk fellasen aaaqeb aqoib mavi, war aaaqeb abarar. Ahat a d u$alen s abrid
Anwa i idensen sennig n win iwumi d dekoen issekniyen n Mass is, iu$al iwexxeo asen? Ih, a d Nerr ppao seg ibe$wviyen
Ni$ Nefka yas Tazmamt i Musa. Ur ppili di ccekk af temlilit yideS! Nerra p d nnhaya i At Isoail
Nesbedd, segsen, iselmaden; nnehun s lameo nne£, mi ueboen, u llan pputebbten $ef issekniyen nne£
Ih, Mass ik, Neppa, ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden
Day ur ten inha ara wayen Nesqucc isuta, uqbel nnsen? La leeeun $ef tnezdu$in nnsen. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen. Day ur sellen ara
Day ur zoin ara Neppawi aman s akal aquoan; Nessuffu$ ed, yissen, iaaqqayen; teppen, segsen, nitni akked lmal nnsen. Day ur pwalin ara
Qqaoen: "melmi l$elb agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "ass n l$elb, liman n wid ijehlen, ur ten infaa; ur pganin
Ihi, wexxeo asen, ggani. Nitni, s tidep, la pganin
A Nnbi! Eezzeb i Oebbi, ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Oebbi, s tidep, Izga d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Ddu akked wayen i k d Ippuweeean, s$uo Mass ik. Ih, Oebbi Ippuxebbeo $ef wayen txedmem
Ppkel $ef Oebbi. Iqadd Oebbi d Awkil

Ur Irra ara Oebbi sin wulawen di tfekka n urgaz. Ur Irra ara tilawin nnwen, i tmetlem ar iarar n tyimmatin nnwen, d tiyimmatin nnwen. Ur irra ara wid id tessekrem, d tarwa nnwen. Ayagi, d awal nnwen, seg imawen nnwen. Oebbi Issawal tidep. Neppa Ippawi d ubrid

Ssiwlet asen am ibabaten nnsen; akka i iwqem ar Oebbi. Ma ur tessinen ara anwi ay d ibabaten nnsen, atmaten nnwen di ddin, d iqoiben nnwen. Ur illi u$ilif $ef wayen teffaliam degs, siwa ayen aammden wulawen nnwen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

Nnbi iqoeb ar lmumnin, sennig iman nnsen. Tilawin is, d tiyimmatin nnsen. Wid ippemyilin, mqaoaben di Tezmamt n Oebbi, sennig lmumnin akked iminigen. Siwa ma tgam tajmilt i imeddukwal nnwen. Ayagi iura di Tezmamt
Mi Neiief si lambiyya lmitaq nnsen, u si kecc, si Nue, Iboahim, Musa, u si Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, Neiief segsen lmitaq lfayeq
iwakken ad Ietec imawlan n tidep, af tidep nnsen. Ihegga d, i ijehliyen, aaaqeb aqeoean
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Mi d usan $uowen iasekoiwen, Nuzen asen d avu, akked iasekoiwen ur twalam. Oebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Mi wen d kkan sennig wen, seddawat wen, mi zzint wallen, ulawen bbwven s ijuxax, tepmeyyizem yal ameyyez $ef Oebbi
Dinna, ppwajeooben lmumnin, enhezzen s leqsee
Mi d nnan ixabiten, akked imehzulen n wul: "ay $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, siwa a$uoou
Mi d inna urbaa segsen: "a yAt Yatrib, ur illi umekkan i kunwi, u$alet"! Kra segsen ssutren tsrie i Nnbi, nnan: "ih, ixxamen nne$ aaran". Nitni, ur llin aaran, b$an kan ad rewlen
Ma kecmen ten id, si leriaf is, sinna, ssutren asen ad xubten, ad xubten. Cwii kan ara kukrun fellas
Ni$ llan auhden s Oebbi, uqbel, ar ur ppu$alen ar deffir. Aaahed s Oebbi ad ippuqeiii
Ini: "ur kwen tenfaa trewla, ma trewlem si tmeppant, ne$ si ioad. Ara tezhum, siwa tallit wezzilen
Ini: "anwa wa, ara kwen ikksen seg ufus n Oebbi, ma Ib$a yawen cceoo, ne$ Ib$a yawen aeunu"? Ur asen ppafen, war Oebbi, bab, ne$ asettao
Ni$ Oebbi Ieoa wid degwen, i ipaawwiqen, wid iqqaoen i watmaten nnsen: "Yyat $uone$"! Drus kan degsen, i ikecmen ioad

D imceeeiyen ar loiha nnwen. Ma tusa d tugdi, a ten twaliv la k pmuqulen, tezzint wallen nnsen, am win tessexciwit tmeppant. Ma tekkes tugdi, a kwen gezren s yilsawen uqviaen. D imceeeiyen $ef lxio. Wigi, ur uminen ara. Ihi, Imea Oebbi igiten nnsen. Ayagi, d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
£ilen ikabaren ur oueen ara. Lemmer a d asen ikabaren, ad ssirmen, ar nitni, di uueeoa ay llan, ar Waaoaben n uclue, steqsayen fellawen. Lemmer llan yidwen, cwii kan ara nna$en
Ni$, i kunwi, Amazan n Oebbi d amedya amxallef i win ippaooun Oebbi, akked was aneggaru, id ismektayen aias Oebbi
Mi walan lmumnin ikabaren, nnan: "ayagi d ayen i $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS. Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, Ssawlen tidep". Ay sen irna kan, siwa liman akked wannuz
Ger lmumnin, llan irgazen i iiifen deg wayen i$ef auhden Oebbi. Garasen, wid ieellen timeooiwt nnsen, garasen wid ipganin. Ur bedlen mavi
Iwakken ad Ikafi Oebbi imawlan n tidep, $ef tidep nnsen, u ad Iaaqeb ixabiten, ma ihwa yaS, ne$ ad asen Issuref. Ih, Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ieeaa Oebbi wid ijehlen, s ieeccio nnsen. Ur ppaddamen lxio. Issuli Oebbi ioad i lmumnin. Oebbi Izga d Uohid, d Uzmir
Issers ed, si lebouj nnsen, wid i sen ifkan afus, seg wAt Tezmamt. Issekcem tugdi deg ulawen nnsen. Arbaa ten$am ten, arbaa teebsem ten
Irra kwen tweotem akal nnsen, ixxamen nnsen, ayla nnsen. D akal ur taafisem. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik: "maday teb$amt tameddurt n ddunit, akked ccbue is, yyamt a kwent $ite$, ad a kwent bru$, berru umain
Ma illa teb$amt Oebbi, Amazan iS, akked uxxam aneggaru, ihi, Ihegga d Oebbi, i taaoviyin, segkwent, arraz ameqwoaean
A tilawin n Nnbi! Tid segkwent ara iawin abekkav ufvie, a ppeppuaaqeb berdayen. Ayagi d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
